name: 1 of 1 Commissioned Custom 24x36 inch Dark Pino Canvas Painting
description: A hand-painted 24x36 inch Dark Pino original canvas — blending abstract luxury and street artistry. A true collector’s piece.

name: 1 of 1 Nike SB Dunk Low x Supreme 'Black Stars' 'DPINO' Custom Sneakers
description: Custom Nike SB Dunk Low x Supreme sneakers re-imagined in Dark Pino style with black stars, luxury tones, and signature detailing.

name: 1 of 1 Nike Blazer Mid 'KAWS x sacai' 'DPINO' Custom Sneakers
description: A fusion of Nike, KAWS, and sacai design — reworked by Dark Pino with hand-painted layers and street-luxury aesthetics.

name: 1 of 1 Nike Dunk Air Jordan Youth 'DPINO' Custom Sneakers
description: A unique youth-sized Nike Dunk x Air Jordan hybrid customized with the signature Dpino art flair — limited and exclusive.

name: 1 Of 1 Nike Dunk Air Jordan 'DPINO' Custom Sneakers
description: An adult version of the iconic Dpino-customized Nike Dunk Air Jordan — hand-finished with premium paintwork and texture.

name: 1 of 1 Chanel $DPINO Custom Boots
description: High-fashion Chanel boots redesigned with Dpino’s luxury graffiti styling and embossed gold '$DPINO' emblem.

name: 1 of 1 Alexander Wang '$DPINO' Custom Boots
description: Alexander Wang boots given a rebellious Dpino twist — blending dark tones, metallic textures, and hand-painted luxury art.

name: 1 of 1 Louis Vuitton LV '$DPINO' Custom Trainer Sneakers
description: Louis Vuitton trainers hand-customized with Dpino’s monogram art, giving classic LV luxury a street-art transformation.

name: 1 Of 1 Mens Gold Balmain Pino Inspired Hand Painted Jeans
description: Balmain gold jeans with one-of-one Pino-inspired paint design — merging luxury denim with avant-garde art.

name: 1 Of 1 Gucci Side Striped Jacket
description: A customized Gucci jacket with signature side stripes and Dpino’s refined artistic touch — crafted for statement wear.

name: Gucci Side-Stripe Technical Green Shorts
description: Luxury meets sport in these Gucci side-stripe green shorts — enhanced with minimalist Dark Pino finishing.

name: 1 of 1 Hand-Painted Gucci Jacket 'Give Jeet Nothing'
description: An exclusive Gucci jacket hand-painted with Dpino’s 'Give Jeet Nothing' design — one of one in the world.

name: 1 Of 1 Louis Vuitton Blouse Unisex Size Large 'Give Jeets Nothing'
description: A unisex Louis Vuitton blouse featuring the 'Give Jeets Nothing' hand-art message in true Dark Pino fashion.

name: 1 Of 1 Nike Dunk Low 'Pino' Custom Sneakers
description: Dark Pino custom Nike Dunk Lows, re-crafted with precision, texture, and artistic intensity.

name: 1 Of 1 Supreme Washed Hooded Work Jacket 'Pino Art'
description: Supreme’s iconic washed work jacket hand-painted with Pino’s abstract motifs — a perfect blend of grit and class.

name: 1 Of 1 Louis Vuitton FW23 Black Yellow Baseball Jacket XXL
description: Louis Vuitton’s FW23 baseball jacket customized with yellow-black contrasts and Pino’s artistic insignia.

name: 1 Of 1 Custom Hand-Painted Louis Vuitton Clutch Pino-Inspired
description: A luxury Louis Vuitton clutch transformed into an art collectible — hand-painted by Dark Pino in rich tonal layers.

name: 1 of 1 Custom Hand-Painted Gucci Bag Bold Dark Pino Art & Luxury Fusion
description: Gucci handbag redefined by Dark Pino — combining fine luxury craftsmanship with bold, abstract expression.

name: 1 of 1 Alexander McQueen 'Dark Pino' Custom Sneakers
description: Alexander McQueen sneakers with a signature Dark Pino hand-painted aesthetic — modern, luxurious, and expressive.

name: 1 of 1 Valentino 'Dark Pino' Custom Sneakers
description: Valentino sneakers turned into bespoke artwork — a one-of-one creation from the Dark Pino collection.

name: 1 of 1 Custom Hand-Painted Louis Vuitton Bag - Bold Dark Pino Art & Luxury Fusion
description: A museum-grade Louis Vuitton bag completely hand-painted by Dark Pino. The centerpiece of art, fashion, and luxury.

name: Dark Pino Lighter
description: Limited edition Dark Pino custom lighter with unique artwork.

name: Give Jeets Nothing Shirt
description: Exclusive 'Give Jeets Nothing' t-shirt with Dark Pino design.

name: Give Jeets Nothing Hoodie
description: Premium 'Give Jeets Nothing' hoodie with custom Dark Pino artwork.

name: Louis Vuitton x NBA Basketball Keepall 55 Travel Bag
description: The Louis Vuitton x NBA collaboration brings this iconic Keepall 55 travel bag. Crafted with monogram canvas and featuring the NBA logo, it's designed for basketball fans and fashion enthusiasts alike.

name: Louis Vuitton x NBA Monogram Black Windbreaker Parka Jacket
description: A stylish windbreaker parka jacket from Louis Vuitton x NBA, featuring a monogram black pattern. The jacket combines comfort and high fashion, perfect for cold weather and sports enthusiasts.

name: Louis Vuitton Timberland 6" Ankle Boot in Black Monogram Nubuck Calf Leather
description: These Timberland ankle boots by Louis Vuitton are crafted from black monogram nubuck calf leather. They combine rugged durability with luxury, making them a unique fashion statement.

name: Burberry Check Folding Umbrella
description: A Burberry classic: the Check folding umbrella. Known for its iconic check pattern and high-quality craftsmanship, it's a stylish and functional accessory for any rainy day.

name: Louis Vuitton Nano Noé Handbag
description: The Louis Vuitton Nano Noé is a miniature version of the iconic Noé handbag, crafted with monogram canvas. A perfect blend of luxury and practicality for carrying your essentials.

name: Louis Vuitton Damier Infini Campus Backpack in White Leather
description: The Louis Vuitton Damier Infini Campus backpack is crafted from white leather, offering a sleek and luxurious look. This versatile bag is perfect for both everyday use and travel.

name: Louis Vuitton Home Mirror Trunk
description: An elegant Louis Vuitton Home Mirror Trunk that combines the brand's craftsmanship with luxurious design. Perfect as a decorative centerpiece or collectible statement piece.

name: Adidas Originals 3D Trefoil 3-Stripes Track Jacket
description: A stylish Adidas Originals track jacket featuring the 3D Trefoil logo and classic 3-Stripes design. Lightweight and comfortable, perfect for casual wear or workouts.

name: Louis Vuitton Ombre Nomade Eau de Parfum
description: The Louis Vuitton Ombre Nomade Eau de Parfum is a luxurious fragrance with rich, woody, and smoky tones. A deep and mysterious scent that captures the essence of exploration.

name: Gucci Script Nylon Jacket
description: The Gucci Script Nylon Jacket offers a blend of sporty comfort and high-end style, featuring the iconic Gucci logo. Perfect for layering during transitional seasons.

name: Louis Vuitton Shorts
description: These Louis Vuitton shorts feature a minimal yet luxurious design with premium materials, perfect for casual summer wear with a touch of elegance.

name: 'Let Us Run' Sneaker Design Commission for Six Hundred Four Shoes
description: A unique art-meets-fashion collaboration sneaker commissioned by Six Hundred Four Shoes, titled 'Let Us Run'. Designed for collectors who value creativity and craftsmanship.

name: Louis Vuitton Monogram Shine Shawl
description: The Louis Vuitton Monogram Shine Shawl combines softness with subtle shine, made from a blend of silk and wool. A timeless accessory for every luxury wardrobe.

name: Robosen Elite Optimus Prime Auto-Converting Robot
description: An advanced Robosen Elite Optimus Prime robot that auto-converts between modes with voice commands. A collector's dream for fans of Transformers and tech enthusiasts.

name: Squid Game 'Young-hee' Doll
description: A collectible Squid Game 'Young-hee' doll inspired by the hit series. A striking display piece for fans and pop culture collectors.

name: Louis Vuitton Millionaires Joystorm Sunglasses
description: Louis Vuitton Millionaires Joystorm sunglasses with bold design and signature detailing. A luxury eyewear statement that blends modern edge with classic LV craftsmanship.

name: Free Breast Implant Surgery
description: A full breast implant surgery, performed by a licensed and professional surgeon. A premium, life-changing experience for those looking to enhance their body.

name: Louis Vuitton Multicolor Monogram Skateboard Deck
description: A collectible Louis Vuitton skateboard deck featuring the multicolor monogram pattern. A bold fusion of luxury fashion and skate culture.

name: Louis Vuitton x NBA Basketball
description: A premium Louis Vuitton x NBA basketball crafted with iconic monogram details. A luxury collector's item for fashion and sports enthusiasts.

name: Louis Vuitton Doudou Re-Addiction Teddy Bear
description: An adorable and highly collectible Louis Vuitton Doudou Re-Addiction Teddy Bear crafted with premium materials and signature detailing.

name: Chanel Blue Quilted Lambskin Mini Rectangular Flap
description: A luxurious Chanel Mini Rectangular Flap bag crafted from blue quilted lambskin. A timeless fashion statement and collector's favorite.

name: Loona V24 Smart Robot Pet Dog
description: Loona V24 is an advanced smart robot pet dog powered by AI, featuring gesture recognition, voice commands, and real-time interaction for kids and adults.

name: PlayStation 5 Slim Ghost of Yotei Gold Limited Edition Bundle
description: A rare PlayStation 5 Slim Ghost of Yotei Gold Limited Edition bundle, crafted with premium gold detailing. A must-have for gaming collectors.

name: Louis Vuitton Monogram Wool Carry On Cap
description: A Louis Vuitton Monogram Wool Carry On Cap featuring luxury craftsmanship and signature monogram styling. A perfect fashion accessory for any season.

name: Samsung 7.5 cu. ft. Smart Gas Dryer with Steam Sanitize+
description: A premium Samsung smart gas dryer featuring Steam Sanitize+ technology, Wi-Fi connectivity, and sensor drying. Offers 10 preset drying cycles and optimal fabric care with 7.5 cubic feet capacity.

name: Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max (512GB)
description: The latest Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max with 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR display, A18 Pro chip, 48MP triple camera system with 5x optical zoom, and all-day battery life. Features Titanium design, Action button, and advanced computational photography.

name: Apple MacBook Air 13-inch M4 Chip (16GB RAM, 512GB SSD) - Sky Blue
description: Apple MacBook Air 13-inch with the revolutionary M4 chip, featuring 10-core CPU and 10-core GPU. 16GB unified memory with 512GB SSD storage. Lightweight design in stunning Sky Blue with Liquid Retina display, up to 18 hours of battery life, and advanced AI capabilities.

name: Samsung Front-Load Washer (Model WW22K6800AW/A2)
description: A high-efficiency Samsung front-load washer featuring model number WW22K6800AW/A2 and serial number 0F2HSADMC09037J. Designed for reliable cleaning performance with modern energy-saving technology.

name: Hermès Birkin 25 Togo Leather Gold Hardware
description: The iconic Hermès Birkin 25 in supple Togo leather with gleaming gold hardware. Handcrafted by master artisans, this timeless investment piece represents the pinnacle of luxury handbag craftsmanship.

name: Rolex Submariner Date 41mm Oystersteel
description: The legendary Rolex Submariner Date in 41mm Oystersteel with black Cerachrom bezel. Water-resistant to 300 meters, featuring the calibre 3235 movement with 70-hour power reserve. The ultimate dive watch.

name: Cartier Love Bracelet 18K Yellow Gold
description: The iconic Cartier Love bracelet in 18K yellow gold, featuring the signature screw motif. A symbol of eternal love and commitment, this timeless piece comes with the original screwdriver.

name: Patek Philippe Nautilus 5711/1A
description: The legendary Patek Philippe Nautilus 5711/1A with blue gradient dial. This highly coveted timepiece features the iconic porthole design by Gérald Genta, automatic caliber 26-330 S C movement, and exceptional finishing.

name: Hermès Kelly 28 Epsom Leather
description: The elegant Hermès Kelly 28 in structured Epsom leather with palladium hardware. Originally designed for Grace Kelly, this sophisticated bag features the iconic turn-lock closure and handstitched craftsmanship.

name: Audemars Piguet Royal Oak 41mm
description: The Audemars Piguet Royal Oak 41mm in stainless steel with blue Grande Tapisserie dial. Designed by Gérald Genta, this revolutionary sports watch features the iconic octagonal bezel with visible screws.

name: Van Cleef & Arpels Alhambra Necklace
description: The Van Cleef & Arpels Vintage Alhambra necklace in 18K yellow gold with mother-of-pearl motif. Inspired by the quatrefoil, this iconic design symbolizes luck, health, fortune, and love.

name: Dior Lady Dior Medium Lambskin
description: The iconic Lady Dior medium bag in supple lambskin with the signature Cannage stitching and gold-tone D.I.O.R. charms. Named after Princess Diana, this elegant piece epitomizes Parisian sophistication.

name: Omega Speedmaster Moonwatch Professional
description: The Omega Speedmaster Professional Moonwatch with manual-winding caliber 3861. The only watch worn on the Moon, featuring hesalite crystal, tachymeter bezel, and legendary chronograph functionality.

name: Tiffany & Co. Diamond Tennis Bracelet
description: An exquisite Tiffany & Co. diamond tennis bracelet in platinum, featuring round brilliant diamonds totaling over 5 carats. Each stone is hand-selected for exceptional clarity and brilliance.

name: Prada Re-Edition 2005 Saffiano Leather
description: The Prada Re-Edition 2005 shoulder bag in durable Saffiano leather with the iconic triangle logo. A modern reinterpretation of the Y2K classic, perfect for everyday luxury.

name: TAG Heuer Monaco Chronograph
description: The legendary TAG Heuer Monaco chronograph with iconic square case and blue dial. Made famous by Steve McQueen in Le Mans, this avant-garde timepiece revolutionized watchmaking.

name: Bottega Veneta Cassette Bag Intrecciato
description: The Bottega Veneta Cassette bag featuring the signature oversized Intrecciato weave. Crafted in Italy from supple leather, this modern icon represents quiet luxury at its finest.

name: IWC Portugieser Chronograph
description: The IWC Portugieser Chronograph with elegant 41mm case and classic blue dial. Featuring the in-house 69355 caliber, this refined timepiece combines Portuguese maritime heritage with Swiss precision.

name: Celine Triomphe Shoulder Bag
description: The Celine Triomphe shoulder bag in shiny calfskin with the iconic brass clasp. Designed by Hedi Slimane, this elegant piece embodies understated Parisian chic and timeless sophistication.

name: Breitling Navitimer B01 Chronograph
description: The Breitling Navitimer B01 Chronograph 43mm with iconic circular slide rule bezel. Powered by the in-house B01 movement, this aviation legend has been a pilot's companion since 1952.

name: Balenciaga City Bag Classic
description: The iconic Balenciaga City bag in soft lambskin with signature hardware and adjustable shoulder strap. Originally designed by Nicolas Ghesquière, this cult classic defined 2000s It-bag culture.

name: Tudor Black Bay Fifty-Eight
description: The Tudor Black Bay Fifty-Eight with 39mm case and vintage-inspired gilt dial. Powered by the COSC-certified MT5402 movement, this dive watch offers exceptional value and heritage design.

name: Saint Laurent Loulou Medium
description: The Saint Laurent Loulou medium bag in quilted Y leather with antique gold-tone YSL logo. This modern classic features a sliding chain strap and magnetic snap closure.

name: Zenith Chronomaster Sport
description: The Zenith Chronomaster Sport with legendary El Primero high-frequency movement measuring 1/10th of a second. This 41mm ceramic bezel chronograph combines precision engineering with sporty elegance.
